title: Game developer distribution worldwide 2014 - 2017 , by gender
summary: Overall Men, Women, and Transgender/Androgynous/Other are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Men, 2. Women, and lastly, 3. Transgender/Androgynous/Other.
The minimum Share of respondents about 4.7, occured at 2016 by Transgender/Androgynous/Other.
